headline: EBARA DRY VACUUM PUMP SYSTEM 127 CFM
description: Dry Vacuum Pump System           Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Ebara
Model 50X20
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 127.0 CFM (3,588.7 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 4.00E-3(En) torr (5.33E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 50.0 mm (1.969 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Duty--Service Corrosive
Two-Stage YES
Direct Drive Yes
Rotational Speed 3,460 RPM
Other Information

Designed for operation in harsh applications such as:
LPCVD, PECVD, CVD and metal etch.
Water cooling manifold w/3/8" NPT connections
N2 purge system w/pressure regulator and flow meter
Fore pump: 3 HP
Rear pump: 2 HP
No controls or motor starters included

Year of Manufacture 1996
Condition Like New
Power Requirements 208/240 V 19.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 30.000 in (76.2 cm)
Depth 18.000 in (45.7 cm)
Height 38.000 in (96.5 cm)
Weight 722 lb (327 kg)
